page.description: Delete the underlying object if it exists. Returns false if an error occurs.
page.example:
dim CallResult as CallResult dim Container as A5Storage::DataContainer = null_value()
CallResult = A5Storage::DataContainer::Open(Container, "Provider='Disk';Container='c:\A5Webroot';") if CallResult.Success dim Item A5Storage::DataItem = null_value() if Container.ReferenceItem(Item, "MyObjectName") if .not. Item.Delete showvar(Item.CallResult.Text, "Error deleting Item") end if end if end if
